title: The weather change twice a week - Rochester, NY
body: <p>I saw <a href="http://www.purevolume.com/beneficial/music" title="purevolume™ | beneficial">this Beneficial dude</a> in Dave's IM profile and I thought it'd be a joke or crappy or something, but <a href="http://www.purevolume.com/player_pop.php?profile_id=86777&amp;k=300&amp;first=461676" title="PurePlayer - Beneficial - Welcome to the ROC">Welcome to the ROC</a> is pretty sweet. It's nice to hear rap about a city I can relate to.</p><blockquote>We not know from caviar, bring steak<br />But ain't no chef that can touch Tahou's and his Garbage Plates<br />Rochester, NY</blockquote>
bodyArticleHtml:
2005-02-17

The weather change twice a week - Rochester, NY

I saw
